Addendum-I to AvSec Order No. 6/2023

Subject: Reconciliation of passenger, their hold baggage, and maintenance
of records thereof-reg

In exercise of powers conferred under rules 3 (2)(b), 20, 39 (1 and 2) and 62
(1) of the Aircraft (Security) Rules, 2023, the Director General, Bureau of Civil
Aviation Security, for the purpose of the safety and security of passengers, crew,
ground personnel and general public in all matters relating to safeguarding against
acts of unlawful interference with civil aviation, directs for partial modification to
the AvSec Order No. 6/2023 dated 15.9.2023

2. The word “passenger(s/’ wherever mentioned in the AvSec Order 6/2023 shall be
replaced with word “person(s/’

3. All other provisions of Addendum to BCAS AvSec Order No. 6/2023 dated
15.9.2023 shall remain unchanged. The above amendment shall be implemented
with immediate effect.

Zulfiquar Hasan, IPS
Director General
